name: view(_:stringForToolTip:point:userData:)
desc: Returns the tool tip string to be displayed due to the cursor pausing at location point within the tool tip rectangle identified by tag in the view view.Required.
declaration:
func view(_ view: NSView, 
stringForToolTip tag: NSView.ToolTipTag, 
    point: NSPoint, 
 userData data: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?) -> String
